param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where values will be localized

param.name: ActiveSteps
param.comment: Value name to save the current number of active steps

param.name: TextID MultiPassengers
param.comment: The text ID for the multiple passengers objective

param.name: TextID SinglePassenger
param.comment: The text ID for a single passenger objective

param.name: SetObjective
param.comment: Set the objectives and run the Objective library

param.name: DestName
param.comment: The Address of the destination. Overrides all other criteria.

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty

param.name: PassengersName
param.comment: The Address of the Passenger Object Group

param.name: InitPassengerCnt
param.comment: The initial number of passengers at the start of the mission

param.name: FeedbackName
param.comment: The address where the step value is stored
